230 <-- tell the firmware all motors are currently down
231 <-- tell the firmware all motors are currently up
21034 <-- move motor 34 a bit down
21139 <-- move motor 39 a bit up

10000000000000000000000000000000000000000
11111111111111111111111111111111111111111 //debugging

10101010101010101010101010101010101010101
